attributes.action: call upon the Queen to show real anti racist leadership to the country and withdraw the invitation to Richard Barnborrk BNP member of the Greater London Authority and the BNP leader Nick Griffin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Her Majesty the Queen should show real anti racist leadership to the country and withdraw the invitation to her summer garden party to both Richard Barnbrook BNP member Greater London Authority and Nick Griffin Leader of the BNP.

In the forthcoming European elections to take place on the 4th of June the BNP will seek to take full advantage of what it will portray as Royal endorsement for it racist politics. We call on the Queen to join with the majority of the country in condemning the divisive politics of the fascist BNP.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot host party political material, such as references to political parties. More guidance can be found here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
